content:
As an AI language model, I do not have access to real-time information such as current restaurant offerings or their locations. However, there are many local restaurants in Jaffna that may serve traditional seafood dishes. Here are a few restaurant names and places to start your search:

1. Mangos - located on Main Street in Jaffna, this restaurant is known for its seafood pitu. 2. Theeran Chinnamalai Mess - located in Nallur, this restaurant is popular for its spicy crab curry. 3. Rio Ice Cream Parlor and Fast Food - located in Jaffna, this restaurant serves a range of seafood dishes like fish puttu and fish curry. 4. Royal Garden - located near Jaffna University, this restaurant serves a variety of seafood dishes like prawn masala, Jaffna crab curry and squid curry. You can also check out local markets such as Jaffna Fish Market, which is known for its fresh seafood and may have restaurants nearby. Additionally, asking locals may provide you with hidden gems that may not be found online.
